name: Planet Z
description:
The story follows an alien with the name of Zed that is forced to crash land on a unknown planet after experiencing difficulties with his spaceship. After surviving the crash, he hops out of the spaceship and decides to walk around the planet to find a way to survive and hopefully fix the spaceship. You encounter fierce space dogs that are protecting ship parts and must fend them off. If you progress further, you encounter more enemies, and the final boss is the moon of the planet.  You must fight the moon for the last tool you need for your spaceship.

Controls: 

Left and Right Arrows to move.

Spacebar to jump.
